doc.title: Actions on Climate Emergency - Fridays For Future
doc.author: Chris Schaumann
doc.excerpt: We call on the European Commission to strengthen EU action on climate emergency.We need 1 million signatures!

main.p:
We call on the European Commission to strengthen EU action on climate emergency.
We need 1 million signatures!
main.head: Actions on Climate Emergency
main.p: We call on the European Commission to strengthen EU action on climate emergency.
